secondaryConsentEnabled.description: For faster resolution, allow Microsoft and Databricks to temporarily have read and write access to your Databricks workspace. We will only access to read and write to your cluster for the purpose of resolving your support issue and in conformance with Microsoft's Privacy Policy.
